    • Method Detail

      • canRollNumber

        public boolean canRollNumber()
        Checks to see if a player can roll. It has to be the player's turn and they can only roll once per turn.
        Returns:
        true if the player can roll, false otherwise
        Precondition
        none
        Postcondition
        true if the player can roll, false otherwise

      • rollNumber

        public int rollNumber()
               throws ClientException
        Simulates the rolling of two dice
        Returns:
        The number rolled (sum of both dice)
        Throws:
        ClientException - when the precondition is not met
        Precondition
        canRollNumber() returns true
        Postcondition
        an int (1-12) with the same odds as that of rolling two dice

      • canPlaySettlement

        public boolean canPlaySettlement(VertexObject vertex)
        Checks if a player can play a settlement. The player has to have the resources (1 wheat, 1 brick, 1 lumber, 1 sheep) for a settlement and the vertex has to be connected to a player's road and at least 2 edges away from another settlement or city. And the player has a settlement left. It also has to be the player's turn
        Returns:
        true if the player can play a settlement, false otherwise
        Precondition
        none
        Postcondition
        whether or not a player can play a settlement

      • playSettlement

        public void playSettlement(VertexObject vertex)
                    throws ClientException
        Places a settlement for the player on a given vertex
        Parameters:
        vertex - the vertex where the player wants to place the settlement
        Throws:
        ClientException - when the precondition is not met
        Precondition
        canPlaySettlement() returns true
        Postcondition
        a settlement will be placed at the desired vertex and settlements will be decremented by 1

      • canPlayCity

        public boolean canPlayCity(VertexObject vertex)
        Checks if a player can play a city. The player has to have the resources (2 wheat, 3 ore) for a city and the vertex has to be connected to a player's road and at least 2 edges away from another settlement or city. And the player has a city left.
        Returns:
        true if the player can play a city, false otherwise
        Precondition
        none
        Postcondition
        whether or not a player can play a city

      • playCity

        public void playCity(VertexObject vertex)
              throws ClientException
        Places a city for the player on a given vertex
        Parameters:
        vertex - the vertex where the player wants to place the city
        Throws:
        ClientException
        Precondition
        canPlayCity() returns true
        Postcondition
        a city will be placed at the desired vertex

      • canPlayRoad

        public boolean canPlayRoad(EdgeValue edge)
        The player has to have the resources (1 lumber, 1 brick) for a road and the edge has to be connected to a player's road or municipality and the edge must not be occupied by another piece. And the player has a road left.
        Returns:
        true if the player can play a road, false otherwise
        Precondition
        none
        Postcondition
        whether or not a player can play a road

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        ClientException - if the precondition isn't met
        Precondition
        canPlayRoad() returns true
        Postcondition

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard()
        Checks to see if a player can buy a dev card. If the player has the resources (1 ore, 1 sheep, 1 wheat) required for a dev card and there is at least one dev card in the bank
        Returns:
        true if the player can buy a dev card, false otherwise
        Precondition
        none
        Postcondition
        true if the player can buy a dev card, false otherwise

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard()
                throws ClientException
        Buys a dev card and places it in the players newDevCards list
        Throws:
        ClientException
        Precondition
        the resources (1 ore, 1 wool, 1 wheat) required for a dev card and at least one dev card in the bank
        Postcondition
        a dev card will be added to the player's newDevCard list

      • canUseDevCard

        public boolean canUseDevCard(DevCard card)
        Parameters:
        the - dev card the player wants to play
        Returns:
        true if the player can use a dev card, false otherwise
        Precondition
        none
        Postcondition
        true if the player can use a dev card, false otherwise

      • useDevCard

        public void useDevCard(DevCard card)
                throws ClientException
        Plays a dev card for the player
        Parameters:
        card - dev card the player wants to play
        Throws:
        ClientException - if the preconditions aren't met
        Precondition
        the player has to have the dev card that he wants to play in oldDevCards
        Postcondition
        the effects of the dev card take effect in the game

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if trade is accepted, false otherwise
        Precondition
        the player has to have the desired resources
        Postcondition
        the trade is either accepted or denied

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
             throws ClientException
        Ends the player's turn and
        Throws:
        ClientException - If this function tries to run when the player can't end his turn.
        Precondition
        It's the player's turn
        Postcondition
        moves newDevCards to oldDevCards. Checks to see if the player has won (10 vicotry points)
